name: GetEarlyAccessFeatures
description:
Retrieve a list of early access features for a project.

This tool retrieves a list of early access features available for a specific project on Datadog. It should be called when users want to see what early access features they can enable or explore for their project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to retrieve early access features for. Obtainable via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: number_of_results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return per page for early access features.

value_schema.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: result_start_index
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results when paginating through early access features.

value_schema.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

value_schema.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

value_schema.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
